about_the_game:
Grapple Gal is a linear 3D Platformer focused on Speed, Momentum and Movement.
Set 50 years from now, in a future in ruin. A cloaked entrepreneur builds several power rigs across the world, sucking the life out the planet and uploading it to a bogus streaming service. An independent detective agency in London gets alerted to these once their city ends up in ruin,
Play as Bullet, an augmented human with a grappling hook arm. Swing through levels at incredible speeds, using your arsenal to travel the world and destroying these rigs and saving the world!

Explore the world at max speed, exploring endlessly replayable stages

Go for the top of the leaderboard with an easy to learn/hard to master movement system

Challenge stages designed to bring the best out of Bullet

Larger than life bosses ready to squash you like a bug

Discover a mysterious force hidden deep in the planets core, destroy the rigs and put a stop to this before you find out what that force actually is...

Set 50 years from now, in a future in ruin. A cloaked entrepreneur builds several power rigs across the world, sucking the life out the planet and uploading it to a bogus streaming service. An independent detective agency in London gets alerted to these once their city ends up in ruin,
Play as Bullet, an augmented human with a grappling hook arm. Swing through levels at incredible speeds, using your arsenal to travel the world and destroying these rigs and saving the world!

name: Grapple Gal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A linear 3D platform where you race through a destroyed future. Play as Bullet, an augmented human with incredible abilities and speed. Navigate environments using your grappling arm, using the momentum you've built to fly through stages at amazing distances.
